mapper.insert: insert into community (com_user_id, com_nickname, com_title, com_content, com_photo, com_category, com_writetime, com_updatetime, com_post_type, com_name, com_companyname) values (#{com_user_id}, #{com_nickname}, #{com_title}, #{com_content}, #{com_photo}, #{com_category}, now(), now(), #{com_post_type}, #{com_name}, #{com_companyname})
mapper.select: select * from community order by com_num desc
mapper.update: update community set com_photo = #{com_photo}, com_title = #{com_title}, com_content = #{com_content}, com_category = #{com_category}, com_post_type = #{com_post_type}, com_updatetime = now() where com_num = #{com_num}
